初遇.encontent:
New friends ... new friends ... new investor ... new
 friends!
初遇.content: 新朋友……新朋友……新投资者……新朋友！

箱中气候.encontent:
Outing canceled?! I'm just getting excited! Damn ...
 Not even a decent enclosed training field here?!
箱中气候.content:
外出取消？！我正在兴头上！该死……你们这儿就没间像
样的封闭性训练场吗？！

致未来.encontent:
I have to say thank you to the "Storm." Without it,
 those old fogies would have never given me the green
 light for research and so much funding.
致未来.content:
我得谢谢这场雨，没有它的刺激，那些保守的老家伙可不
会给我这么多研究经费和行为绿灯。

孑立.encontent: Oh ... No one else's here? Great. I own the place now.
孑立.content: 哦——这儿没有其他人了？很好，现在这儿是我的了。

问候.encontent:
Hmm, hmm ...? Oh, I just ... passed out. Nice to see
 you here. Take the notebook on the desk and write
 down what I say ...
问候.content:
嗯，嗯……？哦，只是——晕过去了。你来得正好，拿着
桌子上的那个本子，我说你记……

朝晨.encontent: The bread is mine now. Make yourself another one.
朝晨.content: 这片面包是我的了，你自己再做一份吧。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Here, take the latest Arcane Biology Daily. Now see
 how they praise me and learn carefully.
信任-朝晨.content:
拿着，这是最新神秘生物学日报，瞧瞧上面的人是如何吹
捧我的，然后好好学一学。

夜暮.encontent:
Next, I'll sing a song here. My dear friends, say goodbye
 to your sleep.
夜暮.content:
接下来，我会在这里高歌一曲。各位亲爱的朋友，和自己
的睡眠说再见吧。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Just you and I? Great! Leave me alone and I will, too.
 Let's sit across each other until dawn! That's the
 best companionship.
信任-夜暮.content:
只剩我和你了？很好！让我们谁也不要打扰谁，对坐到天
亮吧！理想的陪伴莫过如此。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
This? Not bad. It's tough to bite and ... This is your
 hat?
帽檐与发鬓.content: 这个？它还不错，咬起来又韧又——这是你的帽子？

袖与手.encontent:
Don't restrict yourself to the suggested amount. An
 effective trail needs bold attempts. So, I will say:
 full dose!
袖与手.content:
别总盯着推荐剂量瞻前顾后的，好的实验效果需要大胆尝
试。我的建议是：直接拉满。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Hiss ... Hah ... After ten minutes ... the mid clavicle
 ... the fourth rib, remittent ... pain ...
衣着与身形.content:
嘶…哈……第十分钟后……锁骨中线第……四肋间，间歇
性……刺痛……

嗜好.encontent:
You should take a look at the field Laplace prepared for me.
 More than one hundred and twenty square meters. Plenty of balls,
 frisbees, ladders, sandbags, sponge dummies. Of course, it's
 open space.
嗜好.content:
你应该瞧瞧拉普拉斯给我准备的活动场地，一百二十平方
米以上的空地，足量的球、飞盘、爬梯、沙袋和海绵假人
。当然，是露天的。

赞赏.encontent:
Hah, much more comfortable in the suitcase. Flexible
 time for research, independent laboratory ... and
 unlimited freedom.
赞赏.content:
哈，在箱子里舒服多了，灵活的研究时间、独立的实验室
——以及无限制的自由。

亲昵.encontent:
The experiments I do here ... Keep them a secret from
 Laplace. I'll make you an offer.
亲昵.content:
我在这儿做的实验……记得对拉普拉斯保密，我会给你好
处的。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Family ...? Oh! Parents! If you had said this earlier, I would
 have understood. I just don't have any reproductive organs.
 It's not like I'm born from stone. Of course I have a family,
 a mother and a father.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
家人……？哦！亲本！你要是早说这个我就懂了。我只是
缺少生殖系统，又不是石头里钻出来的神子，我当然也有
家人，有妈妈，也有爸爸。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Seriously, how obsessive are you guys ... The pronoun thing,
 I don't give a damn. She, he, they, whatever you like ... Hmm
 ... Well, if you had to choose, rofecoxib and pregabalin, which
 do you prefer?
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
说真的，你们究竟有多执着——称呼那玩意儿我压根不在
乎。她他它，随便你们……嗯……罗非昔布和普瑞巴林——这
两个代称你选一个？

独白.encontent:
Humans are so busy distinguishing themselves from animals, busy
 being arrogant, calling themselves "creator's favorite and miracles"
 ... Hilarious. They think they're so exceptional, yet so much
 mediocrity in front of me.
独白.content:
人们忙着区分自己与动物的关系，忙着高高在上，将自己
称为“造物主最亲爱的孩子与奇迹”……真有趣，他们自
认为特殊，但比起我来却如此平凡。

战前.content: 让我们一起打发时间吧。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Go, go! Go for it! Puppies!

洞悉.encontent:
Thank you very much. How about increasing the research
 funding by tw- ... fifty percent?
洞悉.content: 谢谢谢谢，实验资金再加百分之二……百分之五十如何？

洞悉之底.encontent: Don't run, puppy. I'll catch you in a minute ...
洞悉之底.content: 别跑呀，小狗。我马上就能抓住你了……
